featuresSection.heading: Explore Diverse Rental Configurations When Searching for a Flat For Rent in Sector 104 Noida
description: The rental market in Sector 104 Noida is characterized by its wide variety of modern residential offerings designed to cater to diverse budgetary and spatial requirements. Understanding the types of flats available helps you narrow down your search efficiently.

We categorise the popular rental types available in Sector 104 ensuring you find a home that perfectly matches your lifestyle whether you need a compact space close to the office or a large flat for a growing family.

features.title: Modern Studio Apartment
features.description: Ideal for single professionals or students seeking compact efficient living spaces. These units maximize utility within a smaller footprint often located in high-rise buildings offering premium amenities like gym and security making them excellent choices for those prioritizing location and convenience near commercial zones.

features.title: Spacious 1 BHK Flat
features.description: A step up from a studio a 1 BHK Flat For Rent in Sector 104 provides a separate bedroom and living area offering better segregation and privacy. This configuration is popular among young couples and individuals who require distinct areas for working and relaxing without the commitment of a larger family apartment.

features.title: Comfortable 2 BHK Flat
features.description: The 2 BHK flat remains the most sought-after rental type in Sector 104 Noida perfect for small families or those sharing accommodation. These flats offer ample space two bedrooms and usually two bathrooms providing a balance of affordability and required living area within top-tier housing societies.

features.title: Premium 3 BHK Flat
features.description: For mid-sized families or professionals requiring dedicated guest rooms or home office setups the 3 BHK Flat For Rent in Sector 104 offers generous space and high-end finishes. These units are typically found in the most prestigious projects ensuring superior community living and advanced security features.

features.title: Expansive 4 BHK Flat
features.description: Designed for large or joint families the 4 BHK flats provide unmatched luxury and volume. These rentals often include servant quarters large balconies and panoramic views. Finding a 4 BHK flat for rent ensures you experience the pinnacle of high-rise living in Sector 104 Noida with all necessary facilities nearby.

features.title: Ultra-Luxury Penthouses
features.description: The ultimate luxury rental offering Penthouses in Sector 104 provide duplex living private terraces and bespoke interiors. These exclusive units cater to those seeking privacy architectural excellence and a lifestyle defined by grandeur often featuring smart home technology and dedicated parking.

whyChoose.title: Eight Essential Reasons to Choose Your Next Flat For Rent in Sector 104 Noida
description: Choosing Sector 104 for your rental residence offers significant strategic advantages combining modern residential development with excellent civic amenities. It is an investment in quality of life.
Here is why discerning tenants consistently choose to secure a Flat For Rent in Sector 104 Noida as their preferred address.

points.title: Unbeatable Connectivity
points.description: Sector 104 boasts superb connectivity directly linked to the Noida-Greater Noida Expressway and major arterial roads. This ensures quick transit times to Delhi Ghaziabad and key corporate hubs in Noida like Sector 132 and Sector 142 making daily commutes seamless and stress-free for professionals.

points.title: Modern Infrastructure
points.description: Rentals here are housed in relatively new buildings featuring contemporary architecture and robust infrastructure. Tenants benefit from reliable power backup high-speed elevators and well-maintained common areas significantly enhancing the living experience compared to older sectors.

points.title: High Safety Standards
points.description: Safety is paramount in Sector 104. Most residential societies offer 24x7 security CCTV surveillance controlled access points and trained security personnel providing residents with peace of mind. This secure environment is ideal for families and individuals.

points.title: Proximity to Essentials
points.description: The sector ensures residents never have to travel far for daily necessities. Top hospitals reputed schools international colleges and large retail markets are located within a short driving distance making errands and emergency access highly convenient.

points.title: Lush Green Surroundings
points.description: Despite its urban setting Sector 104 is known for its landscaped open areas and parks. Many apartment complexes incorporate large green zones and recreational spaces providing a much-needed break from the concrete jungle and promoting a healthy outdoor lifestyle.

points.title: Variety of Rental Options
points.description: Whether you seek a budget-friendly 1 BHK or a fully loaded luxury 4 BHK Flat For Rent in Sector 104 the market caters to all. This diversity allows tenants to find a perfect fit based on their budget and required square footage ensuring no compromise on quality.

points.title: Strong Rental Appreciation
points.description: While you are renting you are living in an area with strong future growth potential. This is beneficial if you later decide to purchase property in Noida. The continuous development ensures that the quality of life and available amenities will only improve over time.

points.title: Premium Society Amenities
points.description: Many properties for rent in Sector 104 Noida come with access to world-class amenities like swimming pools clubhouse facilities sports courts dedicated walking tracks and reserved parking spaces transforming everyday living into a resort-like experience.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Finding a Flat For Rent in Sector 104 Noida
faqSection.description: Get clarity on common queries regarding pricing lease terms maintenance and the rental process in Sector 104.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 2 BHK Flat For Rent in Sector 104 Noida
faqs.answer: The rental price for a 2 BHK flat in Sector 104 Noida generally ranges between INR 18000 to INR 30000 per month depending heavily on the society the level of furnishing and the floor area. Premium societies or flats closer to the expressway with higher-end amenities might command prices at the upper end of this spectrum. Always factor in additional maintenance charges which are separate from the rent.

faqs.question: Are most rental flats in Sector 104 furnished semi-furnished or unfurnished
faqs.answer: Sector 104 offers a healthy mix of all three options. Unfurnished flats are common providing tenants with maximum flexibility. However due to the demand from working professionals semi-furnished flats which typically include wardrobes kitchen modular fittings and essential electrical fixtures are very popular. Fully furnished luxury flats are also available but at a significantly higher premium.

faqs.question: What is the standard lease duration when renting a property in Sector 104
faqs.answer: The standard lease agreement duration for a Flat For Rent in Sector 104 is usually 11 months which is then renewable upon mutual agreement. Some landlords particularly for corporate leases or high-value properties may be willing to sign a 12-month or 24-month agreement but the 11-month period minimizes legal formalities related to long-term registration.

faqs.question: How much security deposit is typically required for a rental flat in this sector
faqs.answer: Landlords in Sector 104 typically request a security deposit equivalent to two months worth of rent. For high-demand properties or fully furnished luxury units this deposit may sometimes extend up to three months rent. This deposit is refundable at the end of the tenancy period provided the property is returned in good condition.

faqs.question: Is Sector 104 well-connected by public transport for daily commuting needs
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 104 enjoys excellent connectivity. While the sector is close to the Noida-Greater Noida Expressway making private transportation very easy it is also serviced by local auto-rickshaws and cab services. The nearest operational metro stations are easily accessible providing quick access to the rest of Delhi NCR.

faqs.question: Are pets generally allowed in flats for rent in residential societies in Sector 104
faqs.answer: Pet policies vary significantly between different housing societies and individual landlords. In many modern high-rise complexes pets are conditionally allowed often subject to specific rules regarding size communal areas and payment of a pet security deposit. It is crucial to verify the pet policy upfront before finalising a Flat For Rent in Sector 104.

faqs.question: What documentation is needed to finalize a rental agreement in Sector 104 Noida
faqs.answer: To finalize the agreement you will typically need copies of your Aadhar Card PAN Card proof of employment or student ID for verification. Both the tenant and the landlord must sign the registered rent agreement which requires the presence of two witnesses and sometimes notarisation depending on the agreements specifics.

faqs.question: How do I ensure the Flat For Rent in Sector 104 has reliable water and electricity supply
faqs.answer: Sector 104 being a well-developed area usually has reliable essential utilities. Modern societies provide 24-hour water supply often via borewell and municipal sources. Look for societies offering 100% power backup which is essential during outages common in the NCR region especially for lifts and common area lighting.

faqs.question: Are there good educational facilities nearby for families renting here
faqs.answer: Absolutely Sector 104 is located close to several highly reputed schools and educational institutions including international schools and established CBSE affiliated institutes. This proximity makes the sector extremely attractive for families with school-going children minimizing commuting time and ensuring quality education access.

faqs.question: What maintenance charges can I expect when renting a flat here
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges in Sector 104 typically range from INR 2500 to INR 5000 per month depending on the society and the flat size. These charges cover common area upkeep security gym pool access and waste management. Always confirm if these charges are included in the rent or must be paid separately to the Residents Welfare Association RWA.
